iana.encoding_considerations: Same as encoding considerations of application/xml as specified in RFC 7303.
iana.security_considerations:
OpenStreetMap data carries the same security considerations as GeoJSON. See Section 10 of RFC7946.

In addition, as this media type uses the "+xml" convention, it
shares the same security considerations as described in RFC7303.
iana.interoperability_considerations:
Different implementations of may produce a stricter subset of OSM XML which other implementations may assume.

OpenStreetMap XML is not described by a DTD and applies only the well-formedness rules of XML. It should only be parsed by a non-validating parser.
iana.additional_information:
1. Deprecated alias names for this type: None
2. Magic number(s): None
3. File extension(s): osm
4. Macintosh file type code: None
5. Object Identifiers: None
iana.template_text:
(registered 2016-09-27, last updated 2016-10-05)

Name: Paul Norman
Email: paul.norman&osmfoundation.org

Media type name: application
Media subtype name: vnd.openstreetmap.data+xml

Required parameters: N/A

Optional parameters:
"charset": This parameter has semantics identical to the charset
parameter of the "application/xml" media type as specified in
[RFC7303].

Encoding considerations: binary
Same as encoding considerations of application/xml as specified in RFC 7303.

Security considerations:
OpenStreetMap data carries the same security considerations as GeoJSON. See Section 10 of RFC7946.

In addition, as this media type uses the "+xml" convention, it
shares the same security considerations as described in RFC7303.

Interoperability considerations:
Different implementations of may produce a stricter subset of OSM XML which other implementations may assume.

OpenStreetMap XML is not described by a DTD and applies only the well-formedness rules of XML. It should only be parsed by a non-validating parser.

Published specification:
http://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/OSM_XML

Applications which use this media:
Various. Consumers of this format include http://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Editors. Major producers are https://github.com/zerebubuth/openstreetmap-cgimap and https://github.com/openstreetmap/openstreetmap-website

Fragment identifier considerations:
N/A

Restrictions on usage:
N/A

Provisional registration? (standards tree only):
N/A

Additional information:

1. Deprecated alias names for this type: None
2. Magic number(s): None
3. File extension(s): osm
4. Macintosh file type code: None
5. Object Identifiers: None

General Comments:


Person to contact for further information:

1. Name: Paul Norman
2. Email: paul.norman&osmfoundation.org

Intended usage: Common
Used for exchanging OpenStreetMap geodata

Author/Change controller: Paul Norman
